Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-32414 affecting package libxml2 for versions less than 2.10.4-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-32414 affecting package libxml2 for versions less than 2.10.4-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libxml2 is earlier than 2.10.4-7, affected by CVE-2025-32414
